import React from 'react' import { Outlet,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './index.css' const Checkout=()=>{ const state=useSelector(state=>state.cart); const {ticket,departure,passenger,price}=state.information const navigate=useNavigate(); // 選擇付款方式的回調 const selectWay=(way)=>{ if(way==='bank')navigate('bank'); else if(way==='applepay')navigate('applepay'); else navigate('credit'); } return(

購票資訊

旅程

出發地點

旅客資訊

張數

票價

{ticket}

{departure}

{ passenger?passenger.map((value)=>{ return(

{value.name} {value.email} {value.nationality} {value.number}

) }):無旅客資訊 }

{passenger?passenger.length:0}

{passenger?price*passenger.length:0}

付款方式

總金額 : $ {passenger&&price>10000?price*passenger.length*95/100:price*passenger.length}

) } export default Checkout
